house_listing.house_description: Fabulous contemporary with quality appointments throughout on deep waterfront. Great room very spacious with walls of glass and spectacular views! Fully equipped gourmet kitchen with all top of the line appliances. 6'foot low tide water w/dock,2 boat lifts,pool,cabana w/bar. Quick posession!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Balcony, Boat Dock, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/VaultedCeilings, Contemporary Style, Fenced, Foyer, Garage Door Opener,Outside Sprinkler System, Recreation Room, Walk-In Closet(s), Wet Bar
